name: Rush or Blast
description:
This game was made in 48h for the GMTK Game Jam 2019, the theme was: ONLY ONE.

In Rush or Blast, you can only do one action at a time: either move, shoot or use your shield.

  • Move to avoid enemies!
  • Shoot to destroy them!
  • Shield yourself from projectiles!

Controls

Tab/X - Select an action

Arrow keys - movement/shield

space/C - Choose an action/Shoot

---
